attributes.action: Licence the Removals and Storage industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do most people realise that anybody who has a van can start a Removal and Storage business. That person can then move your effects, and remember the value of your home contents, without any contract if you do not request one, so if you are only interested in price paid and not service or legitamency of a business then you could lose you possesions and have to trace the unlicenced business with whom you have no contract.
